chapter-12_key2: The openpyxl.load_workbook() function returns a Workbook object.
chapter-12_key3: The getsheetnames() method returns a Worksheet object.
chapter-12_key9: They return the highest column and row with values in the sheet, respectively, as integer values.
chapter-12_key14: A formula is set the same way as any value. Set the cell’s value attribute to a string of the formula text. Remember that formulas begin with the = sign.
chapter-12_key17: OpenPyXL 2.0.5 does not load freeze panes, print titles, images, or charts.
chapter-12_key18: Freeze panes are rows and columns that will always appear on the screen. They are useful for headers.
chapter-12_key19: openpyxl.charts.Reference(), openpyxl.charts.Series(), openpyxl.charts. BarChart(), chartObj.append(seriesObj), and add_chart()
